# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-excludes

(?:^|/)Pipfile$
(?:^|/)pyproject.toml
(?:^|/)requirements(?:-dev|-doc|-test|)\.txt$

\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\..
\.mo$

^\.github/actions/spelling/
^\Q.github/workflows/spelling.yml\E$
^\Qrewrite-gradle/src/test/resources/gradle-7.6-wrapper.jar.sha256\E$
^\Qrewrite-hcl/src/main/java/org/openrewrite/hcl/internal/grammar/HCLLexer.java\E$
^\Qrewrite-java/src/main/java/org/openrewrite/java/internal/grammar/MethodSignatureParser.java\E$

^\Qrewrite-java/src/main/resources/META-INF/rewrite/find-plaintext-secrets.yml\E$
^\Qrewrite-json/src/main/java/org/openrewrite/json/internal/grammar/JSON5Lexer.java\E$
^\Qrewrite-maven/src/main/resources/unresolvable.txt\E$
^\Qrewrite-protobuf/src/main/java/org/openrewrite/protobuf/internal/grammar/Protobuf2Lexer.java\E$
